Yan Zheng, with a fierce look, said, 'A Hao, you're filthy rich, right? Tell me, have you been selling drugs with Fat Boy Chao recently? Speak!'
Yan Zheng said, "It doesn't matter if you don't admit it. My colleagues have already told me everything."

Yan Zheng said, "It doesn't matter if you don't admit it." "My colleagues have already told me everything." "Let me tell you, I've been a cop for twenty years." "I haven't taken a single bribe." "So I won't take your dirty money." "Take these gifts and leave immediately!"
A Qi said, 'If you won't leave, I'll leave.' A Qi left, and A Hao watched him go, then lowered his head and sighed.

Lei Luo, who was sitting on the steps, stood up and walked over. He squatted down and looked at the two of them, then slowly said, 'In this world, some people are greedy for money, while others aren't. Yan Zheng is one of the ungreedy ones. Let him go.'
A Qi said, 'In this world, some people are greedy for money, while others aren't. Yan Zheng is one of the ungreedy ones. Let him go.'
A Hao said, "By the way, bro Lei Luo, last time you got Brother Zai to lend me some money. How about I return it now?"
Lei Luo said, "That's it? You're still short on principal and interest. Keep it as a deposit for now. When I need you, you come."
Lei Luo said, "You said it." A Hao said, "I said it." Lei Luo said, "I said it." A Hao said, "Thank you, bro Lei Luo." Lei Luo said, "I said it."

movie101_6973286990817002015_2400_2580.text: The band played and sang: "Wow, awesome, Fat Boy Chao is awesome."
The man said: "Fat Boy Chao is really great"
The two of them were dancing crazily on the dance floor, Xiao Wei even started to play the guitar.
The two clinked glasses, A Hao said, 'Sorry about the last time, Fat Boy Chao'
Fat Boy Chao said, 'Honestly, your help means a lot to me, I really appreciate you, brother.' 'It's good to be your brother.' 'Let's drink again.'
The two drank the red wine in their glasses. The van drove into the rain, and the people inside lit their cigarettes. A Hao said, "Drive faster, we're late."
The scene shifts to a man holding a child and saying, 'Mom, I'm so hungry, are we there yet?' The man replied, 'We're almost there, your dad is waiting for us at the dock.'

The scene switches to the sea, where a man says, "Brother, brother, seems like it's Water Cop ahead." The man on the ship says, "Attention, fishing boat ahead, we're Hong Kong Maritime Police, switch off your engine immediately, prepare for inspections"
The police chased after them, and the people on the boat shouted, "There are cops, hurry to the stern, get in the water, quick, get in the water."

The scene switches to the stormy weather, with the sea water surging and the rain pouring down. The women and children on the boats were all wearing life jackets, and the boats were filled to the brim with people.
Fishing Boat Owner said, 'It's hard on you.'
The Japanese soldiers were all watching the fun, and only one soldier was guarding the prisoners. The three prisoners took the opportunity to escape.

The scene switches to the dam. The police, holding guns, stood on the dam, while the villagers below were desperately clinging to the edge of the dam, trying to rescue the people in the water. The police asked, "What are you doing here?"

The scene shifts to the dock, where a group of Japanese soldiers are gathered. One of them, who has captured a sailor, is saying, 'What did he say?' Another soldier, holding a sailor, replies, 'No clue.' The Japanese soldier, growing impatient, stabs the sailor with his knife and says, 'Now I've got you by the throat.' At this moment, a gunshot rings out, and the Japanese soldier immediately stops his actions. The camera pans to reveal that the shot was fired by a person on a small boat.

Fishing Boat Owner, who had just surfaced, was immediately pulled back under by a drug dealer. A Hao, who had been struggling to swim, suddenly found a burst of energy and swam towards the struggling fishing boat owner. He reached out and pulled the drug dealer's gun, saying, 'This was given to me by my wife.'

The scene switches to the middle of the river where the master and the apprentices are struggling in the water. The disciples are continuously hitting the master's head with their elbows. The master, who is sinking slowly, is still trying to keep his head above water, but eventually, he will be submerged.

A Hao, holding a gift box, said: "A Hao, you're really screwed now." "Look, there's lipstick mark." "Are you making fun of me, brat?" "Don't think I don't know what you were up to in the bathroom with that woman."
The scene switches to the water surface, where the people on the ship are still fighting each other. The wooden planks that were originally blocking the path have been cleared away by the crowd.

movie101_6973286990817002015_240_420.text: A Ping said: "Nine out of ten times it won't work. Stop shouting nonsense, damn it, just take the money."
The three of them then went to a small noodle stand. After slurping down the noodles, David handed the bowl to A Ping. A Ping took the bowl and said, "Tuition fee."

Piggy and Lei Luo were waiting outside the nightclub. When they saw Lei Luo's car approaching, Piggy said, "Lei Luo bro, you're late." Lei Luo replied, "Busy, you know." Piggy said, "Hey, Yan Tong is so stingy, you know."
Lei Luo said: "Wow, big spender. He'll be so happy he'll drool, let's go." The two walked into the hotel, and the waiter greeted them.
Lei Luo said: "It's just a birthday, but they've made it look like the Queen's birthday." Lei Luo walked over to Yan Tong's Wife and greeted her.

Lei Luo said: 'It's for Yan Tong sir.' Yan Tong's Wife took the box from Lei Luo's hand and put it on the table. Lei Luo said: 'Take it over yourself, I won't serve you.' Yan Tong's Wife said: 'No need to be formal.'

Lei Luo said, "Wow, no wonder they don't look at you directly. Turns out there's so much their mom could open a gold shop." Lei Luo took out a gold bar from the box and continued, "This isn't about money." "Then put it there." "Of course, I want it to be obvious. If you're not convinced, bite me."

Officer Hunter said, 'Of course, I want it to be obvious. If you're not convinced, bite me.' Officer Hunter, who was playing mahjong, stood up and walked over to the table with the gold bars. He pushed the players aside and said, 'Sit down,' 'Sit down,' 'Officer Hunter wants to play with you.'

Officer Hunter said, 'Sit down,' 'Officer Hunter wants to play with you.' The bald man handed him a bag and said, 'This is yours.' The bald man said, 'That Officer Hunter is drunk again.' The bald man said, 'Let's start playing.'
Officer Hunter said, "He's interesting. He always behaves like this when he’s drunk." The crowd started jeering for them to gamble.

Officer Hunter said, "Pay up, come on!" The players around all laughed and said, "That's right, be careful or you’ll lose it all." "It's yours, you have it too, you have it too." "Officer Hunter's point is, anyone wanting a promotion or wealth, just take it."
Officer Hunter, with a stern face, said, "Who's the boss now, huh?"
Officer Hunter said, "What, do Brits not have to repay gambling losses?" He then grabbed Lei Luo's collar.
Yan Tong said: "What are you doing, you're drunk." Yan Tong's Wife said: "Stop!" Yan Tong's Wife slapped Piggy, and Yan Tong said: "Take the officer to wash his face."
Yan Tong, furious, walked over to Lei Luo and said, 'You just got promoted to detective and you're showing off?' 'Daring to hit an officer?'
Yan Tong said, 'So you're acting tough even in Yau Ma Tei? Do you want to manage Wan Chai? Are you daring enough to hit me too?'

Lei Luo said, 'Let's go.' Piggy said, 'We're leaving, happy birthday.' Lei Luo said, 'Don't be angry, let's go dance, ah, I'll go with you!' Piggy said, 'What? Let go, let go, I'm fine, I'm fine.' 'If it weren't for you, I would’ve shot him.'

Piggy said: 'What? Let go, let go, I'm fine, I'm fine.' 'If it weren't for you, I would’ve shot him. Patience, revenge can wait ten years. A little impatience spoils great plans. Think of it as constipation, bear with it.'

movie101_6973286990817002015_2580_2760.text: The scene shifts to the Hai River, where the water flow is swift. People are struggling to swim, and Ah Mui is among them. Ah Mui is holding a child, making it difficult to move. Suddenly, Ah Mui lets go of the child, sinking into the river. The child is floating on the water surface, while Ah Mui is nowhere to be seen.
The screen gradually fades to black.
A Hao and A Qi got out of the car, and A Qi said, "Sister-in-law, how could this happen! How could there be a death! I want to take them home."
A Qi said, "Sister-in-law, how could this happen! How could there be a death! I want to take them home."
A Hao, in despair, knelt on the ground and wailed, 'Why, why is this happening, why?'
A Hao and others were all asking why, why is this happening, why, why, why.
The scene shifts to the pier. The workers are still searching for the body of Ah Mui.

A Hao, who was nearby, was squatting on the ground, crying and wailing, while Piggy was sitting on the ground, staring blankly at the sea. Everyone was busy burying the past, and no one paid attention to the person in the leather jacket.
A Hao, with tears in his eyes, looked at Ah Mui, then at the police. A Qi, seeing this, quickly turned and ran away.

Six months later, Lei Luo and Piggy are sitting in the canteen eating. Lei Luo says, "Big Gray Bear and Gong Zi Qiang's behavior is getting more extreme. There was a big fight a while ago, and now they are fighting guerrilla wars."
Lei Luo said, "Recently, more than twenty people were killed, and fifty many were injured. The superiors are not happy."
Lei Luo said, "A good cocaine business, made into a pot of porridge, how to eat?"

Lei Luo: "You want to overturn him, clean up, and start again." "If you really uproot it, wouldn't Fei Zai Chao become dominant?" "If Fei Zai Chao listens to me obediently, leave him a share, find two people, take the positions of Big Gray Bear and Gong Zi Qiang."
Lei Luo said, "If Fei Zai Chao listens to me obediently, leave him a share, find two people, take the positions of Big Gray Bear and Gong Zi Qiang."
The scene shifts to Piggy, who says, "You really are a good brother. When Big Gray Bear went to gamble in Temple Street, you took the opportunity to show up."
Big Gray Bear, who was soaking in the bathtub, heard the door open and immediately became alert, grabbing a nearby dagger and gripping the handle tightly.

The scene shifts to the hospital, where Big Gray Bear is lying in bed drinking heavily. The two people nearby are playing with a radio. Big Gray Bear, who is drunk, sees them and immediately gets up to snatch the radio.

Lei Luo said: “It’s easier to kill Big Gray Bear who is courageous but reckless, but Gong Zi Qiang is the nephew of Ding Ye, the old city fortress. If you touch him, I'm afraid Kowloon District will be chaotic.”

movie101_6973286990817002015_2760_2940.text: Lei Luo said, "No, no, no, it's too dangerous." "If you go in like this" "What if they turn hostile?" "Let's ask A Hao for help."
A Hao said, "That's true. After his wife died, he lost it. He's become a wreck, spacing out all day. We can't rely on him this time."
A Hao, who was sitting on the sofa, slowly stood up, then casually picked up a cigar from the table and lit it. He then walked towards the railing.
The scene shifts to a man lying on a leather sofa. At this moment, the door was kicked open, and three men walked in. David said, "You short-lived fool, do you think we're talking nonsense?"
A Hao said, "You short-lived fool, do you think we're talking nonsense?" "Still, you have no memory, do you?" "What did I tell you last time?" "Don't buy, don't buy."
Lei Luo said, "Don't buy, right?" "I told you not to come in." "Or I'll break your legs." "How can you be so useless?" "Why are the three of them together?" "Please, Big Brother Wei."

The scene shifts to the three men outside the bathhouse. David said, "Get up. Do you need a hit?" The man nodded repeatedly. David then said, "Go listen to what Baldy is saying." The man agreed and left.
A Hao said, "Rest assured, we got this. As long as that SOB dares to come in alone, I'll take him out. Don't worry."

Lei Luo said, "Master Ding trusts me the most. After today, you won't see Lei Luo again." The scene shifts to the police station, where Lei Luo is putting on a bulletproof vest. Piggy asked, "Do we really have to use this?" Lei Luo said, "Alright, be tough."
The security guard said, 'Better safe than sorry, nothing will happen. And even if something does, you won't get seriously hurt. Hurry up, thanks.'

The scene shifts to Piggy, who is still explaining to Lei Luo. Lei Luo takes the gun and asks, 'What is this?' Piggy replies, 'This is a signal flare. If anything goes wrong, shoot it immediately. I'll rush in as soon as I see it.'
Lei Luo said, "Alright, whatever you say." Lei Luo then drove to the front of the building, and the scene shifted to the inside of the building.

Lei Luo got out of the car and walked towards the alley, with Piggy following closely behind. The two arrived at the front of a vegetable stall, where Lei Luo said to Piggy, 'I'll wait for you here. If anything happens, send the signal. I'll rush in immediately.'
Lei Luo, who was walking in the middle, was staring at the door of the small house. The door was closed, and the inside was dark.
Lei Luo said, "Everyone, pay attention." The group walked into the corridor, and the man in the floral shirt took the opportunity to escape. Lei Luo quickly gave chase.

The scene shifts to the basement where Xiao Wei, David, and Yan Tong are hiding. Xiao Wei, who has just returned from the first floor, said, "All of Gong Zai Qiang's people have returned to the city, they're armed, and many from Brother Chao's side went in as well."
Xiao Wei said, "All of Gong Zai Qiang's people have returned to the city, they're armed, and many from Brother Chao's side went in as well."

The scene shifts to a basement where a group of people are gathered. The furnishings were simple, with a few tables and chairs and some basic cooking utensils. Everyone was busy and orderly preparing for the upcoming auction.

movie101_6973286990817002015_2940_3120.text: The scene shifts to a luxurious room, where Lei Luo sits on a chair, smoking a cigar. The furnishings in the room are all of high quality, exuding an air of luxury. A man in a suit and tie sits on a leather sofa, smoking a cigar. The room is lit by three wall lamps, giving off a warm light.

The scene shifts to a small room upstairs, where Lei Luo and his men are playing mahjong by the table. The three of them are bare-chested, fanning themselves with their sleeves. A Hao walks in with a box of cigarettes, followed by a man in a suit.

The scene shifts to a street corner where a group of people are gathered in twos and threes. A Hao and Lei Luo are standing in the middle of the crowd, with Dingye sitting in a wheelchair in front of them. The three of them are looking at the man in front of them, who is shirtless and covered in tattoos.
The workers here are different from the ones at the construction site; they are shirtless, with muscles bulging, glaring fiercely at Lei Luo.
Lei Luo, who was originally walking at the front, immediately turned around and walked towards the crowd upon seeing this.
Dingye said, "Lei Luo, we meet again. The good tea you brought me is highly praised by everyone."
The scene shifts to a room where gold bars are stored. Lei Luo said: "If Uncle likes it, I'll send it every day."

A Hao, who was smoking, was suddenly pushed forward by a man. The man said, 'Excuse me, let us through.' A Hao, who was smoking, was suddenly pushed forward by a man. The man said, 'Excuse me, let us through.' A Hao, who was smoking, was suddenly pushed forward by a man.

The scene shifts to a dimly lit room, where a man in a suit sits on a chair, smoking a cigar. Next to him, a bald man with a goatee is staring at the entrance of the room. The man sitting on the chair is the boss of the fight club, Dingye. The man standing by his side is his bodyguard, Gong Zai Keung.
Dingye stood up and said: 'Lei Luo, please.'
Gong Zai Keung said, "Uncle, that cop is always looking for bribes. You have to be careful."
Dingye said: "Our city and the outsiders have always minded their own business. No one dares to change this rule. You and Grizzly Bear have caused chaos outside."
Dingye said, "Now, Lei Luo has come in person to make me hand you over. Tell me, what should I do?"
A Hao said, 'Brother Hao, all entrances and exits to Dingye's clubhouse are sealed; no one can get in.' A Hao was rummaging through a bag when Gong Zai Keung suddenly kicked him.
A Hao, who had just entered the room, heard the sound of the radio and walked towards it. He bent down to pick up the radio from the table and then turned to look at the three people.
Lei Luo said, 'Uncles, I need to appoint a new person to handle affairs in the walled city.'

Dingye said, "Lei Luo, I will give you an explanation regarding the change of personnel." Dingye was about to go upstairs when he was blocked by a group of people. He pushed through the crowd and walked up the stairs. The crowd was about to follow when they were stopped by a group of men in black.

Lei Luo, who was hit by the bullet, fell to the ground. A Hao, who was hiding in the dark, took the opportunity to run away. Lei Luo got up and chased after him. Dingye, who was also hit by the bullet, fell to the ground. Gong Zai Keung, who was hiding in the dark, took the opportunity to run away.

movie101_6973286990817002015_3120_3300.text: Lei Luo, who was shot in the head, fell to the ground. The police quickly chased after Da Wei, who was running away.
The crowd shouted: "Lei Luo killed Dingye" "Didn't he" "Yes, Lei Luo killed Dingye!" "Yes, yes, I saw it with my own eyes" "Lei Luo killed Dingye"
The scene shifts to the alley where everyone gathered. Da Wei said, 'Listen up, no one is allowed to let Lei Luo escape, stay sharp.'
A Hao shouted: "Lei Luo killed Dingye, don't run!"
The crowd, upon hearing the news, became agitated. Someone shouted, "He's here, don't run! Lei Luo killed Dingye," "He's here, don't run! Catch him!"
The enemies were numerous and powerful; they quickly overwhelmed Da Wei and others, leaving them injured and in dire straits.
The man in the suit, A Qi, was the first to rush into the building, pulling out a gun and shooting at the enemies inside. He then helped Da Wei up and retreated.

The scene shifts to the entrance of the Dragon Dance Troupe, where the thugs are still searching for the members. A thug kicks open the door of the snack shop and rushes in, only to find the place empty. The thug shouts: "Catch him, catch him!"
A Hao, who was hiding in the dark, saw the police leave and immediately jumped down from the window, running towards Dingye. Dingye, who was lying on the ground, was already covered in blood.

The assassin swung his knife at Lei Luo, but Lei Luo dodged and the knife hit the cabinet. Lei Luo then kicked the assassin's knee, causing him to fall to the ground. The assassin picked up a gun and fired at Lei Luo, who quickly hid behind the cabinet.

The thugs, holding iron rods, rushed at the trio. A Hao and Da Wei quickly grabbed wooden planks and smashed them towards the thugs. A Qi, seeing the situation turn, grabbed a wooden cabinet and smashed it towards the thugs as well.
The thugs were all knocked down by Lei Luo, and the leading A Hao was also punched to the ground.

A Hao, with a gunshot wound to the abdomen, struggled to get up and crawled towards Da Wei. Da Wei shouted, "Bro, bro, A Hao, A Hao," A Hao said, "Da Wei, the signal flare's gone; I can't call for help, I can't reach the outside."
Dingye, lying on the ground, said, "A Hao, ah, the signal flare's gone; I can't call for help, I can't reach the outside."

A Qi, who had been hiding in the dark, took the opportunity to escape. He ran to the rooftop, intending to flee through the skylight. But as he pushed the skylight open, he was hit by a large piece of furniture that fell from above.
Da Wei and Xiao Wei arrived at the iron gate, and Da Wei picked up a brick from the ground and smashed it towards the lock.
Da Wei, who had been hiding behind the door, immediately rushed out upon seeing this, grabbed the thug's leg, and yanked him down. He then picked up a nearby stool and struck the thug's head hard.
Da Wei and Xiao Wei ran into a dead end, with the thugs in hot pursuit. Da Wei shouted, "Over there, chase," and the thugs, undeterred, continued to advance.

movie101_6973286990817002015_3300_3480.text: A Qi and Piggy rushed over with kitchen knives. A Qi said, 'Haoge, you can't protect him.' Haoge said, 'Don't worry about it, save me some face, save me some face, move aside, move aside.'
A Hao shouted: "Don't come any closer, if anyone dares, I'll kill them, come on!"
A Hao, holding a gun, pointed at the crowd and said: "We came out to be loyal, Lei Luo saved me in front of those British bastards, shouldn't I repay it?"

A Hao said: "We came out to be loyal" "Lei Luo saved me in front of those British bastards" "Shouldn't I repay it?" "A favor owed is remembered for a thousand years" "Haven't your parents ever taught you guys?"
A Hao said: "Tell me, tell me," "Today, leave a way out for Luo Ge," "I, A Hao, will surely repay you all,"
A Hao, holding a kitchen knife, said: "Repay your mom" "Not a single one left"

A Hao and Lei Luo were still fighting valiantly, but the underlings were too numerous, and the two were gradually overwhelmed. A Hao was shot in the leg and fell to the ground, unable to get up. Seeing this, Lei Luo picked up a wooden table and smashed it towards the underlings. He then grabbed a chair and swung it at the approaching enemies, buying time for A Hao to escape.

A Hao, who was hiding in the dark, saw the police running away and immediately pressed the remote control button. A burst of dazzling fireworks shot out from the rocket launcher, lighting up the entire city.
The scene shifts to Piggy, who is smoking a cigarette. He looks up and sees a flare heading straight for the building. Piggy exclaims, 'Damn, fireworks, not flares'
A Qi, who was hiding behind the door, took the opportunity to attack with a knife, but was blocked by the iron gate.
The group of men in black quickly caught up, and A Hao, while running, said: 'Go to the back.' 'Quickly.'

A Hao, who had just killed someone, was still in a frenzy. He picked up the iron rod and chased after Lei Luo. Lei Luo was running for his life, and A Hao was relentlessly closing in. Lei Luo was cornered and had no way to escape, so he braced himself and stood there. A Hao swung the iron rod and hit Lei Luo on the head.

A Hao, who had just entered the door, was immediately surrounded by a group of people holding sticks. However, A Hao handled the long sticks as if they were nothing, breaking them all with his bare hands.

A Hao was still not satisfied, continuously kicking at Lei Luo's chest. Lei Luo, who was already lying on the ground, was kicked by A Hao to the corner of the wall. A Hao then lifted Lei Luo's leg and threw him onto the table.

The two quickly circled around to the back of the building, where Piggy was still anxiously searching for a way out. Gong Zai Keung, who had been knocked down several times, finally found an opportunity and grabbed a wooden plank from the ground. He swung it at the approaching Piggy, but was still kicked to the ground.
A Hao, who was hiding behind the wall, saw this scene and immediately ran to the door, grabbing the iron rod and smashing it towards the thug's head.
A Hao, who was hiding in the corner, saw this scene and rushed out, grabbing a wooden stick and hitting Lei Luo while saying, 'Not afraid of death? Come on, come on, come on!'
A Qi said: 'Not afraid of death? Come on, come on, come on, you come too, you bastard, come on!'

movie101_6973286990817002015_3480_3660.text: A Hao, who had just run out of the building, was immediately blocked by a man holding a long stick. He quickly sidestepped, using the opponent's weapon against them, and then kicked the door of a resident's house, entering and closing it behind him.

A Hao was kicked by Lei Luo and fell against the wall. Lei Luo then turned to attack Fat Boy Chao, but Fat Boy Chao dodged and kicked Lei Luo away. Lei Luo was thrown against the wall, and A Hao, seizing the opportunity, got up and attacked Lei Luo.

A Hao was kicked by Lei Luo and fell against the wall. Lei Luo then turned to attack Fat Boy Chao, who was caught off guard. Lei Luo's leg was grabbed by Fat Boy Chao, and he was dragged to the ground. Lei Luo used his elbow to strike Fat Boy Chao's arm, and then broke free to stand up.
Fat Boy Chao said, "Your time has come, you traitor, I trusted you so much, and you betrayed me, you're going against me?"
Lei Luo said, "You're going against me? Want to play the hero, is it?"

Zhong Qin, who was still chasing after the car, fell to the ground, and the car completely disappeared from sight. Wang Xiaobo, who was lying on the ground, was still unconscious, and Zhong Qin, who was lying on the ground, was also still unconscious.

Zhong Qin, who was lying on the ground, was still in a coma. He slowly opened his eyes, sat up, and looked around. He got up and walked forward, only to find that his pants were covered in bird droppings.

Zhong Qin, who was pruning trees, was still working diligently. He climbed up a tree with a ladder, trimmed the dead branches, and then climbed down to drag the cut branches away. He was fully focused on his work, completely unaware of the man lying on the ground.
Zhong Qin, who was nearby, was still not satisfied. He moved closer to the trunk, ready to shake the tree again. Wang Xiaobo, who was lying on the ground, was still not awake.

Zhong Qin, who was nearby, was observing Wang Xiaobo's sleeping condition. He slowly walked to the side, squatted down, and looked at Wang Xiaobo. Seeing no reaction from him, Zhong Qin stood up and looked around.
Zhong Qin, who was woken up, was still half-asleep. He got up, staggered over to Wang Xiaobo, and began to untie the ropes on his body.
Zhong Qin, who was nearby, was also scared by the sudden appearance of the woman. He quickly crawled away, and Wang Xiaobo, who was lying on the ground, also fainted.
Wang Xiaobo was lying on the blanket, staring blankly at the sky, while Zhong Qin was crawling through the vines, looking for something.
Wang Xiaobo was lying on a blanket, fanning himself with a palm-leaf fan, his gaze fixed on the two people in the distance.

The scene shifts to the next day, Wang Xiaobo is still lying in the same spot, the blanket under him has fallen to the ground, he is still in a deep sleep, his eyes are tightly closed, his mouth slightly open, his arms are bent, one hand is under his head, the other hand is on his chest, his legs are bent, one foot is flat on the ground, the other foot is raised, and he is still snoring in his sleep.
Mrs. Zheng walked over and said: "Hey, wake up, wake up, hey, you've slept all night, alright."
Mrs. Zheng said: "Oh dear, still looking at me, huh?" "That's right, that's it," "My Sesame at home smells just like this," "I'm telling you."
Wang Xiaobo said: "My Sesame at home smells just like this, I'm telling you."

movie101_7089369392055583246_4020_4200.text: Wang Xiaopo said: 'What did I do?' 'What do you think? You have no idea?'

The woman said: 'What do you think? You have no idea? Well, let me suggest something. Take the money, and return the sesame to me, then it's all settled, right? Anyway, I don't have it now, the police don't know, nobody knows.'
The girl said: "Why should I call him? I didn't tell the police." "Ah, you really are something." "Oh, oh, oh, I didn't call for that."

At this moment, Officer Zhang got out of the car and asked: "Is it Wang Xiaopo?" Wang Xiaopo replied: "Yes, it is." Officer Zhang asked: "Wang Xiaopo, what are you doing here?" Wang Xiaopo said: "Big Sister, we're looking for Sesame."
Officer Zhang looked at the two of them and said: "It's you again, the one who wrapped dog poop in newspaper." "Sesame, what does that mean?"

At this moment, Officer Zhang's police radio suddenly transmitted a message. The message said: 'Officer Zhang, Officer Zhang, there's been a two-car collision at Grass Gate, please go handle it.' Upon receiving the message, Officer Zhang immediately prepared to leave.

Officer Zhang said: "Okay, I'll be right there. Your dog won’t be lost forever. When your husband returns from his trip, he can help you look for it. Wang Xiaopo, you seem a little haggard lately. You need to sleep well in addition to doing good deeds, it's about time to leave."

Officer Zhang said: "Hey, uncle, you, dropped, dropped, dropped this." Wang Xiaopo said: "It's okay, it's okay, I can manage it myself." Officer Zhang said: "Goodbye, Uncle." Wang Xiaopo said: "Hey, okay."
The two were still gesturing with their hands when a police car arrived. The two quickly stopped their actions and stood still. The camera then switched to a news report on TV.

The scene shifts to the office, where a colleague is broadcasting the news: 'Last night's incident involving an armored vehicle on the western city thoroughfare, the traffic police department has already contacted the military district, confirming no military exercises have been scheduled recently. So where exactly did this armored vehicle come from?'

The scene shifts to the office, where a colleague asks: "Hey, can you help me revise this section?" "If you're not sure, you can check this website, it has everything." "Remember, don't mix up these two sections." "Thank you."

The scene shifts to the office, where a man with a bandage on his face walked in, saying: 'One of us, clear the way.' A woman nearby said: 'Your face is wrapped up like a rice dumpling.' The man replied: 'What are you doing, playing the Mummy and scaring people?'
Xiao Tang said: 'Journalist Chen, since you know you’ve disfigured yourself, don't come out and scare us during the day like this, all wrapped up.'

The man in the suit said: "Scare people? He's advertising toilet paper." The woman said: "Let's go." The man in the suit said: "Journalist Chen, come here, let me have a look." The man in the suit said: "Don’t touch me, what are you doing, get up." The woman said: "My goodness, we can’t stay wrapped up like this. With this wrapping, you’ll become the Phantom of the Opera within a couple of days."
The colleagues said: "My goodness, we can’t stay wrapped up like this. With this wrapping, you’ll become the Phantom of the Opera within a couple of days."
The man said: 'Really? This quack doctor, in order to swindle a bit of medical fees, nearly disfigured me. Hurry up and unwrap this, unwrap, unwrap it.'

The scene shifts to a company, where a man with a bandage on his head and a neck brace sits in the lobby. The staff said: 'Sit down, let me check, sit here.' The man sat down, and the staff helped him remove the bandage and took his glasses. The man said: 'Gently.' The staff said: 'I know.'
The woman said: 'I know, hold onto your glasses yourself,' 'Hold onto them alright,' 'How do I unwrap this,' 'Ouch, I see it,' 'It doesn't hurt, does it?'

movie101_7089369392055583246_4200_4380.text: Fenfen said: "I went home late at night, guess what I saw?" "An armored vehicle." "It rushed past my eyes." "Too fast to catch up." "It's like a ghost tank."
Fenfen said: "It rushed past my eyes." "Too fast to catch up." "It's like a ghost tank."
Xiao Tang said: "Well, you're bluffing, even the cows are flying in the sky, hey, Fenfen, tell us how you fell into the pit yesterday, were there any beauties in the pit?"
Xiao Tang said: "Nonsense, you didn't even conduct an interview on site, and you still have a work injury. You've let our editor-in-chief down."
Fenfen said: "You don't talk to me about this." "I" Xiao Tang said: "Slow down." Fenfen said: "Hello, who is it?" "Hello hello hello, really?"
Fenfen answered the phone and said: "Hello, who is it?" "Hello hello hello, really?"
Xiao Tang said: "Fine, fine, alright, I'll be there right away, wait for me." Xiao Tang hung up the phone and said: "Who was it on the phone?"
Fenfen, who was lying on the ground, got up and walked out of the hospital. Everyone chased after him, and Mrs. Zheng grabbed Wang Xiaopo and said: "Don't leave, wait a minute, wait a minute"

Mrs. Zheng said: "Hey, don't leave, wait a minute, wait a minute, wait a minute, hello." "Hello." "Ah, h-honey, hey, I'm looking for Sesame, I put the money there, but she didn't give me the dog back."
Mrs. Zheng said: "She said you behaved well and didn't call the police, so she agreed to extend the deadline. Just leave the money under our street lamp."

Mrs. Zheng, while speaking, pulled Wang Xiaopo: "Okay okay, I'll be right back, okay okay, goodbye, okay okay, goodbye." Then, while pulling Wang Xiaopo, said: "I'm sorry, I was wrong, I've wronged you." "I, I was wrong." "I, I, I..."
Mrs. Zheng said: "Okay okay, okay okay, I'll be right back, okay okay, goodbye, okay okay, goodbye." "Hey, could you please help me move this wheel, that plastic bag is mine, okay?"
Mrs. Zheng said: "Oh sir, please I beg you, my Sesame has been missing for two days already. It never eats strangers' food, I don't know how it survived these two days, you you you, please."

At this moment, the phone rang. Wang Xiaopo answered the phone, and the person on the other end said: "Wang Xiaopo, I saw the armored vehicle you made on TV, what a piece of junk. It's not what I wanted at all. Didn't I give you the blueprints? I tell you, I don't want that armored vehicle anymore, I just don't want it"

Da Xu angrily said: "I saw the armored vehicle you made on TV, what a piece of junk. It's not what I wanted at all. Didn't I give you the blueprints? I tell you, I don't want that armored vehicle anymore, I just don't want it"
Wang Xiaopo said: "You, let me explain, hello..." "That day, if it weren't for my hair..."
Wang Xiaopo, who was making a call, was startled by the voice from the other end, and the phone fell to the ground. He looked at the phone in confusion and said: "Da Xu pick up the phone"
Da Xu said: "Who said that?" "How could it be possible?" "He dare to refuse?" "I'll call him right now."

movie101_7089369392055583246_420_600.text: Da Xu said: 'To earn more money so we can sort out the Zhang Li matter earlier.' 'What I mean is, to settle the marriage with Zhang Li earlier.'

Da Xu said: 'Earn more money so we can sort out the Zhang Li matter earlier.' 'What I mean is, to settle the marriage with Zhang Li earlier.' 'I was thinking, you should arrange a house for me.' 'Without a set of house keys, there’s no way to get past the mother-in-law.'

Da Xu said: 'Isn't Zhang Li in real estate?' 'Even so, she's somewhat of a little rich woman.' 'I'm only good at the tough stuff.' 'Women are honored to please others; men who try to please end up poor. Were you short on money for stock trading?'
Da Xu said: 'No, no, no, don't talk to me about stocks. Don't talk about it, it's too upsetting.'
Da Xu said: 'Hey, Wu Ming, let's talk seriously. Are you not working on some movie now? If your crew has any jobs, give my brother a shot at it.'
Da Xu said: "Actually, there is something, but I don't know if you guys can do it. We're short an armored vehicle and can’t rent one; it has to be made to order."

Da Xu said, "Hey, that's no big deal, I'm telling you, you've found the right guy." "Ask around the whole city," "who doesn't know I'm into military stuff just like Xiao Po—top-notch aficionados?" "I'll have you know, apart from things that fly in the sky or dive underwater, any other object, just name it, anything you want."

Da Xu said: "Hey, that's no big deal, I'm telling you, you've found the right guy." "Ask around the whole city," "who doesn't know I'm into military stuff just like Xiao Po—top-notch aficionados?" "I'll have you know, apart from things that fly in the sky or dive underwater, any other object, just name it, anything you want."
Da Xu said: 'Don’t think I'm joking, this is a big job worth tens of thousands.'
Da Xu said, 'Let's do it together.' The two agreed and started drinking together.
The scene shifts to the interior of the model building, where everyone is busy. The open space is filled with people, and the construction models of various sizes are spread across the tables.
Da Xu looked at the design and said: 'Who drew this? The barrel is drooping soggily, doesn’t it have muscle atrophy?'
Da Xu said: 'Why do you speak so crudely? We're amongst cultured people here; can't you be a bit more polished? This is called erectile dysfunction, you know.'
At this moment, a man walked in and said, 'Hey, I've arrived, sorry for being so busy, the director invited me to lunch, where's the design?'
Da Xu said: "Hey, I've arrived, sorry for being so busy, the director invited me to lunch, where's the design?"
Da Xu said: "I've been a senior in production for years; I wouldn't have agreed if I didn't have the clout."
Wang Xiaopo took out a design draft and said: 'How's that?' Da Xu looked at the draft and exclaimed: 'Goodness, one million six hundred thousand.'
Wang Xiaopo said: 'What, one hundred and sixty thousand, you added an extra zero.'

movie101_7089369392055583246_4380_4560.text: Da Xu, while walking out, took out his phone and dialed a number, but no one answered. He kept redialing.
Da Xu was walking and talking on the phone, saying: 'Wu Ming, what's going on? Why are you backing out now? No, don't be joking; we have a contract signed.'
Da Xu said: 'No, no, listen to me, Wang Xiaopo put all his money into this thing for you. What do you expect him to do now? You can't play this game; it could cost lives.'
Da Xu anxiously said: 'No, no, listen to me, Wang Xiaopo put all his money into this thing for you. What do you expect him to do now? You can't play this game; it could cost lives.'
Da Xu said: 'No, no, no, just hear me out, or else just give me two more days, alright? I'll take care of everything according to the plans. Okay? Do me a favor, please.'

Da Xu said: 'Alright, I'll wait for you to finish the exterior shots.' 'Hurry up, bye.' After saying that, Da Xu hung up the phone. Wang Xiaopo's phone rang again. Wang Xiaopo answered: 'Hello, Da Xu, how's it going?' Da Xu said: 'Master, the company is asking us to work overtime.'

Wang Xiaopo said: 'Overtime? Don't they let us rest even on Saturdays?' The person on the other end said: 'Master, the company wants us to quickly check the high-voltage line near Qingliang Men.' Wang Xiaopo said: 'Not going, not going. I'm not feeling well today.'

Wang Xiaopo said: "Master, you should still come. If not, per regulations, I have to go by myself. I'm practically begging you; if there's any mishap with this task, I won’t be able to become a permanent employee next month."
Wang Xiaopo, while walking, answered the phone. Mrs. Zheng asked, "Where are you at?" Wang Xiaopo replied, "I'm right beneath the iron tower across from Wu Hua Tai Securities at Qingliang Men."
Mrs. Zheng said, 'Sir, my pet Sesame hasn't been seen for two days. Please help me.'
Wang Xiaopo said: "Can you wait here for a bit? I'm really asking you." After saying that, Wang Xiaopo left, and the two went their separate ways.

The scene shifts to the street where Wang Xiaopo is driving a tricycle with Da Xu. Wang Xiaopo says to Da Xu, "Why are you just standing there?" "Why aren't you wearing your uniform?" "Stop your nagging and get to work."
Wang Xiaopo climbed the tower, and Da Xu handed him a rope. Wang Xiaopo said, 'This one's no good, needs replacing.' Da Xu replied, 'Master, I didn’t bring a new one.'
Wang Xiaopo said: 'How can you be so dense? I just can never teach you.'
Wang Xiaopo, who was going up the ladder, said: "What are you looking at? Hurry back and get one!"
Da Xu was still chasing Shen Yan, and Shen Yan was still running. Da Xu said: "It's you, you, don't run, don't run."
Da Xu said: 'I'm asking you, did you tamper with our generator?'
Da Xu said: 'Okay, let's forget about the generator then, but tell me, was that armored vehicle thing you’re doing?'

movie101_7089369392055583246_4560_4740.text: Da Xu asked: 'How did you guys find out?' Reporter Chen replied: 'Dude, stop pretending, you're a celebrity on the internet now.'

Da Xu said, 'Where's the armored vehicle? Let me take a look.' Reporter Chen said, 'What armored vehicle? There's none.' Da Xu, still unsatisfied, said, 'Don't bother me, I need to get tools to fix something.'

The scene shifts to the stock market, where Grandpa is explaining to the crowd: 'This time, the decline in China's stock market is completely due to this, the country's subprime mortgage crisis. You see how they borrowed money to spend here and now they can't settle their accounts, affecting our stock market.'
Grandpa said: 'I'm telling you, you old man, how can you have your feet in two boats?'
Grandpa said: 'Are you being dishonest in your speech now?' 'Huh?' Grandpa turned around and left, and Auntie followed him. Grandpa said: 'Ma'am, how could you just say I have my feet in two boats?'

Grandpa said: 'You still don't admit it?' Auntie said: 'But you never made your intentions clear to me, willing to be with me.' Grandpa said: 'I'm saying, shouldn't you men always take the initiative a bit?'

Grandpa said: 'If you put it this way, I understand completely. I want to tell you that I, as a person, would never have my feet in two boats. If I ever have my feet in two boats, let me fall off this iron tower.'
Grandpa said, 'If I ever have my feet in two boats, let me fall off this iron tower.'

Da Xu, with a sense of righteousness, said, 'What's the big deal?' and then rode his bike away. Da Xu stopped his bike at a corner, and a hand suddenly reached out from the bushes and pulled him. Da Xu asked, 'What are you up to?'
Da Xu said: 'Do you even know what this is? Messing around with it without a clue.'
Da Xu said, 'Goodness, you even know it's a tank? Knowing it's a tank and still messing with it? I should take you to the military court straight away.'
Da Xu said, 'I'm just joking with you. What are you doing?'
Da Xu said, 'If I can't get the thing out, my precious is gone. Do you get it? My sesame.'
Da Xu said, 'Oh, is it your own child? In danger? Kidnapped? Call 110.'

Da Xu said, 'Kidnapping a dog is also illegal.' Mrs. Zheng said, 'Oh, hurry up and move the vehicle a bit, would you?' Da Xu said, 'Alright, alright, I'll move it right away. Have you seen my friend?' 'A guy.'
Da Xu said, 'Alright, alright, I'll move it right away. Have you seen my friend? A guy.'
Da Xu looked at the departing Mrs. Zheng, puzzled, and said, 'He's gone off?' Then he took out his phone and said, 'Just wait a moment. I'll call him.'
Da Xu, while watering the plants, muttered to himself, "What's with this lunatic, turning his phone off?"

movie101_7089369392055583246_4740_4920.text: Da Xu said: 'Wait, wait, wait a moment.' 'Could you hurry up?'
Zhang Li said: "Hello, Da Xu." Da Xu said: "Zhang Li, is Wang Xiaopo with you?" Zhang Li said: "No, I don't know." "Shouldn't he be with you?"

Da Xu said: "How should I explain it to you?" "Let me tell you, aren't you guys supposed to get married?" "Wang Xiaopo, well, he wants to buy a house, but he doesn't have money." "So, I introduced him to a business opportunity." "It's for my friends who are making a film." "They need a tank prop."
Da Xu said: 'How should I explain it to you? Let me tell you, aren't you guys supposed to get married?'

Da Xu said: 'No, it's not. Our car was lost on the street, how would we know it broke down? And my friend from the film, he just called to say that they don't need the car anymore. I think Wang Xiaopo is about to lose his mind. What should we do?'

Da Xu said: 'No, it's not. Our car was lost on the street, how would we know it broke down? And my friend from the film, he just called to say that they don't need the car anymore. I think Wang Xiaopo is about to lose his mind. What should we do?'
Zhang Li said: 'You figure something out, I'm going to look.' After saying that, Zhang Li hung up the phone and went to the office to look for the person in charge.
Zhang Li was still at the office desk, looking at the deserted meeting room, puzzled. Meanwhile, Wang Xiaopo was running with Wang Mei on the street, and Wang Mei asked, 'Am I heavy?'
Wang Xiaopo said, 'Am I miserable? I really don't want to do this anymore.'
Wang Xiaopo said: 'There's no time to figure that out now. If I had gone to college, I wouldn't be in this position where I can't even afford a house.'
Wang Xiaopo said: 'Don't try to be a tough guy, if you want to jump then jump.' Zhang Li said: 'Are you trying to drive him crazy?'
Zhang Li picked up the phone and dialed a number, then put it to her ear, waiting for the other party to answer.
The scene shifts to the park, where Mrs. Zheng is hiding behind a tree, eavesdropping on the conversation of the two sisters.
The two of them walked to the side of the road, where they saw Mrs. Zheng pruning the overgrown wild grass. Reporter Chen said, 'Goodness, this is too cool.'
Reporter Chen, who was pruning trees, saw the reporter and hurriedly called Mrs. Zheng. He said, 'What's the matter, did Mrs. Zheng not come again?' 'Alright, then hide.' 'Hmm.'
Reporter Chen said: 'Alright, I won't chat with you now. I have a small issue.'
Reporter Chen said: 'Last week, he insisted on attending a charity auction. He donated money to a poor student.' 'But you need to know this.' 'Mrs. Zheng’s wife is notoriously stingy.'

Reporter Chen said: "It's not about the donation" "It's about how if she hadn’t leeched off of me during the dinner" "He would now be one, not daring to go home" "And two, the creditors constantly coming after him" "His only choice is to hide."

movie101_7089369392055583246_4920_5100.text: Mrs. Zheng said: 'How much money does it take to push someone to this state?' 'Just 6000,' 'Now, too scared to even attend class, hiding all day long.'
Mrs. Zheng said: 'It can't be that bad' 'To push your husband into this state' 'His wife is indeed a bit extreme.'
Mrs. Zheng said: 'Hey, big sister, you can't say that. How do men turn bad, isn't it because of women pushing them? Hey, you won't be like that in the future, will you?'
The woman said: 'What are you looking at, you're annoying.'

The scene shifts to the city center, where Wang Xiaopo sits on a ladder, overlooking the scene below. The city is surrounded by mountains on all sides, with buildings of various heights densely packed. The streets are bustling with people coming and going.
Wang Xiaopo said: "Hey, I'm working, get back, get back!"
The scene shifts to the roadside where the villagers are all standing, craning their necks to look into the distance, all wearing expressions of joy.

The officer pointed at Lu Xiao and said, "Fine, Yang. You're lucky this time. We'll see about that. Let's go." The officer then led the soldiers out of the room. As the door closed, Lin Lin's expression turned fierce, and she immediately drew her gun.

Lin Lin, holding the gun, sat on the floor, crying uncontrollably. She looked at the man who had just been shot, her face filled with grief. The gun in her hand had already fallen to the ground. The moon in the sky was half covered by clouds, and the wind was strong.
Mo Han, who was sleeping on the other side, was awakened by the sound of the radio and turned over to turn it off.

Mo Han sat by Lin Lin's bed, watching her sleep soundly. He gently moved his hand that was holding the fan, placed it on the bed, and then slowly lay down beside Lin Lin. He stared at Lin Lin for a long time, his eyes filled with deep affection. Mo Han wrapped his arms around Lin Lin, and the two of them fell into a deep sleep.

Mo Han, who was sleeping on the other side, was awakened by the sound of the radio and noticed something was wrong. He turned on the light, saw Lin Lin's condition, and immediately got out of bed.
Mo Han, who was sleeping on the other side, was awakened by the sound of the door closing. He turned over and saw Lin Lin's luggage on the bed. He got up to check the situation.
Mo Han, who was sleeping on the floor, was awakened by the sound of the door closing. He immediately got up and looked towards the door.

Mo Han, who was squatting on the toilet lid reading a book, heard the sound of the toilet flushing and immediately opened the book to look for something. After a while, he closed the book, put it in his arms, and left the restroom.

Mo Han sat on the toilet lid reading a book, engrossed in the content. He was so focused that he didn't notice the water leaking from the toilet tank. By the time he came out of his reading trance, the floor was already soaked.
The next day, Lin Lin was still lying in bed, half-awake, when suddenly a ringtone from a mobile phone woke her up. She immediately got out of bed, opened the door, and saw Mo Han standing outside.
Mo Han, who was about to get up, heard Lin Lin's words and sat back down, saying, "Ah, I'm looking for clothes." Lin Lin replied, "Looking for clothes? They're in the bathroom."
Mo Han said, 'Then I'll be going back first.' Mo Han got up and left, while Lin Lin remained on the bed, turning over and over again.
The scene shifts to a dimly lit room where Lu Xiao is making a phone call. He says, "Please connect me to 4321, please connect me to 4321 once more."
Lu Xiao said, "Please connect me to 4321." "Please connect me to 4321 once more."
The scene shifts to Lu Xiao, who is still eavesdropping on the conversation between Lin Lin and Mo Han. He is getting anxious, and his breathing becomes heavier.

The two of them chatted and laughed all the way, completely unaware that Old Lady He was already sitting at the village entrance, waiting for them.
The next morning, Liu Mengting was busy in the kitchen, pouring the cooked rice into a bowl.

movie101_7235213933035192887_960_1140.text: Liu Mengting said: "Auntie He, this is the newly bought medicine. It's more effective than the last one. You need to take it once a day. Don't forget."
Liu Mengting said: 'Okay, I got it!' Liu Mengting took the medicine from Auntie He's hand and put it in her pocket. Zhang Xiaobao was taking photos of the room's layout.

Zhang Xiaobao said: 'Hey, Chun Hu bro, what a coincidence, you're here too.' Chun Hu replied: 'Yes, Auntie He hasn't been well, so I brought a turtle I raised myself to help Auntie He regain strength.' Liu Mengting said: 'Chun Hu bro, please have a seat!'
Chun Hu said: 'Alright, alright, Auntie He, look, this turtle is so fresh! Auntie He, are you feeling any better?'
Auntie He said: 'Thank you, Chun Hu, you're such a good person. You never forget us old folks, even during holidays you give us red envelopes.'

The scene shifts to the village committee, where the announcement for the village party organization election is posted. The announcement reads: 'According to the requirements of the higher-level party organization, our village will elect the next committee members of the Party Organization.'

The scene shifts to Director's home, where Director is sitting on the sofa, and Bao Liang is holding a starfish, examining it. Director says: 'Bao Liang ah, you didn't need to bring a gift when you came. Why are you being so polite?'
Bao Liang said: 'Director, this is the pig face we cured ourselves at home. You can't find this kind of stuff in Jiangxi.'

Director said: 'Take it to the kitchen and prepare it well. Let's have it for lunch.' Bao Liang and Chun Hu agreed. Director continued: 'Prepare a good bottle of wine, so I can have a drink with Bao Liang.'

Director asked: 'How's business in the first half of the year?' Bao Liang replied: 'Not too great, business is tough these days.' Director said: 'You're being humble, aren't you? You've always been the richest person in our village.'
Bao Liang said: 'Oh, richest in the village? I'm barely scraping by. For instance, I wanted to expand my pig farm.'

Bao Liang said: 'That's a good thing!' 'But dealing with the land isn't easy.' 'The two households living there refuse to move no matter what, causing a big fuss.' 'Today, I'm hoping you, Director, can put in a good word and help my cousin out.'
Bao Liang said: 'Today, I'm hoping you, Director, can put in a good word and help my cousin out.'
Director said: 'Bao Liang ah, this timing isn't right, we're in the middle of the village organization election, and since you're my cousin, if I speak up for you...'
Director said: 'We're in the middle of the village organization election, and since you're my cousin, if I speak up for you, those with ulterior motives will accuse me of favoritism.'
Bao Liang said: 'In our village, with the surname Zhang, going back three generations, aren't we all relatives? Are you really afraid of that?'
Bao Liang asked, 'Do you have some sort of leverage that they're holding against you?' Director replied, 'Leverage? How could that be? My pig farm has all the proper paperwork.'
